Player History
Traded from New York (N) to Milwaukee on 3/2/1965 (Going to MIL: SS F. Mantilla, RF J. Piersall. Going to NYM: SS R. McMillan, SS B. Bethea, CF B. Robinson)...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Los Angeles (N) on 6/23/1966...
Signed as a free agent by California on 2/2/1967 to a 2-year deal worth $2,880,123 per year...
Was selected to the 1967 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/1/1968, hitting .458 with 2 HR, 4 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 2/14/1969 to a 1-year deal worth $4,510,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Minnesota on 2/14/1970 to a 2-year deal worth $4,500,000 per year...
Traded from Minnesota to Texas on 7/7/1971 (Going to TEX: 2B F. Mantilla. Going to MIN: RF J. Schlueter, DH R. Colavito)...
Signed as a free agent by Minnesota on 2/2/1972 to a 2-year deal worth $2,000,000 per year...
Released by Minnesota on 2/6/1972...
Signed as a free agent by Minnesota on 2/16/1972 to a 2-year deal worth $4,500,000 per year...
Drafted in 3rd round, 60th overall pick, by Texas in 1973...
Injured on 5/5/1975 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 5/6/1975 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 3 days...
